title: IoT Sensor Hub
summary: Multi-sensor environmental monitoring system with remote dashboard.
architecture: An IoT system with multiple sensors connected to an Arduino, which sends data to a Raspberry Pi via MQTT. A Python script on the Pi processes the data and displays it on a remote dashboard.
responsibilities: Designed the hardware setup, wrote the Arduino and Python code, and configured the MQTT broker for communication.

title: 3D Printed Robotic Arm
summary: Robotic arm controlled via Python scripts and custom controller.
architecture: A 3D-printed robotic arm with servo motors controlled by a custom C++ firmware on a microcontroller. High-level control is provided by Python scripts that send commands to the arm.
responsibilities: Designed the 3D model for the arm, developed the C++ firmware for motor control, and wrote Python scripts for automation.

title: Modular IoT Kit
summary: Portable IoT prototyping kit with interchangeable modules.
architecture: A modular IoT kit featuring an ESP32 mainboard and interchangeable sensor modules. Data is sent to a React-based dashboard for real-time monitoring.
responsibilities: Designed the modular hardware system, developed the firmware for the ESP32, and built the React dashboard for data visualization.
